Kennedy Meadows Resort and Pack Station operate Baker Campground and charge the following fees:
$25.00 for a single-family site
$50.00 for a double-family site
Kennedy Meadows Resort operates this campground under a special use permit administered by the Forest Service. The fees paid by concessionaires finance the refurbishment of facilities in the campgrounds they operate.  The Interagency Senior and Interagency Access Passes are honored and provide a 50 percent discount on camping fees in the campground. Discount does not apply to double or group sites. Pass number must be written on fee envelope or Pass must be shown to Host.  The Interagency Annual and Volunteer passes do not provide any discounts on camping. Passes are not accepted for double sites.
restrooms: Restrooms are available at this site.
water: Potable water is not available at this site.
